Apr 9, 2024

Advisory board Meeting
----------------------

Notice is hereby given that the Laguna Vista Community Development Corporation will hold a Meeting on Thursday, the 11th day of April, 2024, at 5:30 pm, at Laguna Vista City Hall located at 122 Fernandez, Laguna Vista, Texas

May 14, 2024

Town Council Meeting May 2024
-----------------------------

Notice is hereby given that a Regular Meeting of the Town of Laguna Vista, Texas will be held Tuesday, the 14th day of May, 2024, at 6:00 pm., at the South Texas EcoTourism Center, 501W TX-100, Laguna Vista, TX 78578.  
Pursuant to Texas Government Code sec. 551.127, one or more members of the Town Council may attend and participate via video conference.  
  
Agenda found here:  
<https://lvtexas.us/uploads/meeting_agenda/CM_Agenda_-5_15_24.pdf>

[Read More](https://www.lvtexas.us/news/entering-a-new-era-of-iot)

[![Town Council Meeting May 2024](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/4923f8_a51d6e81a2564264b912338d6c157857~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_34,h_34,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Image-empty-state.png)](https://www.lvtexas.us/news/entering-a-new-era-of-iot)

Mar 20, 2023

CDBG-MIT RCP RFP Packet
-----------------------

Below please find the Cover Letter, RFP Information Sheet and Sample Scope of Services for the City of Laguna Vista’s Community Development Block Grant-Mitigation (CDBG-MIT) Resilient Communities Program (RCP) RFP for planning and management services.
